Name: Zoning, Ocean Crest Article XI Technical Correction, Queens (G 250081 CCQ).
Title: Application number G 250081 CCQ (Ocean Crest Article XI Technical Correction) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation requesting a technical amendment to Council Resolution 950 for the year 2025 related to an Article XI tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law, and related to the Ocean Crest development located at Block 15744, Lot 17, Borough of Queens, Community District 14, Council District 31.
